name: SiouxRitmo
0:
”Alexa, ask sue ritmo what's playing.”
”Alexa, ask sue ritmo to play live.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sue ritmo
Developer Terms of Use
des: Sioux Ritmo, located in Sioux Center, Iowa, plays Spanish Adult hits from the 80s, 90s, 2000s, and today. Sioux Ritmo is affiliated with Fox News Radio and Minuto 60 News. Local news updates can be heard weekdays about 8:15a, 9:15a, 11:15a and 12:15p. Stay up-to-date on the weather with 24/7 Weatherology coverage. Sioux Ritmo also carries local high school football play-by-play each week in the fall with occasional local sports broadcasts in other seasons.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
